text: haha I guess I’m just automating the response I will give anyway if it doesn’t work!

Is this the hubdb item you were interested in?
> I can’t use the HubDB as that doesn’t allow for personalisation tokens to run as filters for emails.
> Can you elaborate on that?
HubSpot doesn’t allow you to use HubDB in email marketing when you are using contact/deal personalisation tokens to filter it. At least from what I’ve tested and what I’ve read
